Destined for Greatness.name: Destined for Greatness
Destined for Greatness.trigger: You fail a saving throw and you are not dying
Destined for Greatness.effect: You reroll the saving throw with a +4 power bonus. In addition, you can spend a healing surge.

Bloodied Greatness.name: Bloodied Greatness
Bloodied Greatness.flavor: Your enemies’ attacks push you over a threshold, and you tap into a fresh reserve of strength. You unleash one of your ightiest attacks, fueled by your pain.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: An enemy bloodies you

Effect: You use one of your encounter attack powers against the triggering enemy. That power can already be expended, and if it is not, using it through this power doesn’t expend it.
Bloodied Greatness.effect: You use one of your encounter attack powers against the triggering enemy. That power can already be expended, and if it is not, using it through this power doesn’t expend it.
